Package net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.synchronization

Klasse SynchronizedScreen

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider.WallGUIProvider
net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.synchronization.SynchronizedScreen
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ComponentTreeProvider
public class SynchronizedScreen extends WallGUIProvider implements ComponentTreeProvider
A specific type of WallGUIProvider that synchronizes the displayed content for all players.

  • Methodendetails

    • updatePlayerScreens

      public void updatePlayerScreens(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Synchronizes the player's components with the current components. NEVER CALL THIS WHEN BEING INSIDE A CLICK ACTION OR ANY OTHER METHOD CALLED BY ADVANCEDGUI! THIS WILL CAUSE A ConcurrentModificationException!
      Parameter:
      player - The player the components should be updated for

    • updatePlayerScreens

      public void updatePlayerScreens()
      Synchronizes the player components with the current components. NEVER CALL THIS WHEN BEING INSIDE A CLICK ACTION OR ANY OTHER METHOD CALLED BY ADVANCEDGUI! THIS WILL CAUSE A ConcurrentModificationException!

    • getComponentTree

      public me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.components.GroupComponent getComponentTree()
      Returns the component tree to allow editing the components of this synchronized screen.
      Angegeben von:
      getComponentTree in Schnittstelle ComponentTreeProvider
      Gibt zurück:
      component tree to modify components
